item.title: OS as Code - My Experience of NixOS
item.description: It’s February 2024, exactly 10 months since I started using NixOS. The beginner notes I wrote initially have received a lot of positive feedback and some sponsorships, becoming one of the most popular entry-level tutorials in the entire community. Since I created a dedicated GitHub repository and a separate documentation site for it in June 2023, it has garnered 1189 stars, and besides me, 37 other readers have submitted PRs:

item.title: NixOS & Nix Flakes - A Guide for Beginners
item.description:
Since the article is so long now, for the convenience of readers, the content of this post has been moved to a separate site:
